name: Sweet Candy Burst
description:
Welcome to the paradise of sweet candies! There are so much surprise while exploring the candy world. Switch and match your way through hundreds of levels in this delicious puzzle adventure. Reach the goal before the moves run out!  These amazingly delicious puzzles are ready to satisfy your sweet tooth!

Features:
♥ Over 300 sweet levels
♥ Identify and match 3 or more candies of the same to blast
♥ Collect breads and cakes for the preparation of tough levels
♥ Unique obstacles and fun puzzles
♥ Mouth-watering new graphics and cool effects
♥ Powerful magical boosters to help with challenging levels
♥ Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master

Be bathed on super hit Sweet Candy Burst now!!
